game.name: Toy Simulator
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Start as a tiny frog, eat smaller creatures, grow in size and strength, evolve into a monstrous amphibian that's even bigger than elephants. How absurdly big can you get?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Start as a tiny frog, eat smaller creatures, grow in size and strength, evolve into a monstrous amphibian that's even bigger than elephants. How absurdly big can you get?
